sentences.sContent: Give me your money and passbook.
Bank Clerk: Here are your card and passbook. Please bring either one when you deposit or draw money. Keep them well and inform us if you lose them.
sentences.sContent_eng: Bank Clerk: Here are your card and passbook. Please bring either one when you deposit or draw money. Keep them well and inform us if you lose them.
sentences.sCn: 银行职员：这是您的卡和存折，存取款时请带来。保管好存折，如有遗失请及时告诉我们。

remMethod.val: pass(审查通过) + book(账簿) → 通过审查的账簿 → 存折

trans.tranOther: a book in which a record is kept of the money you put into and take out of a bank account
